IncludesItemsYouDoNotHave: 警告：此設定檔中含有您尚未擁有的項目
NoLocalPackagesFound: 在您的電腦上找不到外掛程式。
NoPackagesMatchFilters: No packages match what you're looking for.
CopyAllIdsFiltered: Copy all filtered items' names & IDs
CopyAllIdsSelected: Copy all selected items' names & IDs
StartScratch: 從頭開始創建一個設定檔
SomePackagesWillBeDisabled: 更改此設定檔的用途將會移除某些外掛程式。
ConfirmDeletePlayset: 您確定要刪除設定檔「{0}」嗎？
PlaysetMerge: Add all of this playset's mods to your active playset
PlaysetExclude: Remove all of this playset's mods from your active playset
OpenPackagePage: 打開此外掛程式的詳情頁面

OpenPackageFolder.Plural: Open all selected packages' file locations

OpenLocalFolder: Open the folder containing this package

ReDownloadPackage.Plural: 重新下載所有選中的外掛程式

ShowDatesRelatively: 顯示當前時間的相對日期
CouldNotCreatePlayset: Could not create a new playset.
CreatePlaysetHere: Create a new playset or activate a previous one by clicking here
DisableNewModsByDefault: Disable newly added mods by default
DisableNewAssetsByDefault: Disable newly added assets by default
FilterOutPackagesWithMods: Hide code mods in the packages page
FilterOutPackagesWithOneAsset: 在外掛程式頁面中，隱藏僅包含單個資產的外掛程式
NoDlcsNoInternet: 無法載入 DLC，請聯網並檢查加速器 / VPN
DlcUpdateNotice: 如果您的DLC沒有顯示在此處，請確保至少打開過一次遊戲

MovePackageToLocalFolder.One: 將外掛程式複製到本機資料夾
MovePackageToLocalFolder.Plural: 將所有選中的外掛程式製到本機資料夾

LaunchTooltip: 點擊以啟動 / 關閉 Cities: Skylines，或在程式中任意位置按 [F5]
ShowingFilteredItems: 當前顯示 {0} 項，共 {1} 項
JoinDiscord: 在 Discord 上獲取幫助
LinkModAssets: 將模組自帶的前置資產，與模組本身的裝載狀態關聯
LinkModAssets_Tip: 有些模組自帶其正常運行所需的前置資產（取訂這些資產可能導致模組出錯）。啟用此選項，可以將模組與其所需的前置資產綁定，並在資產頁面中隱藏這些前置資產，以避免意外地將這些資產移除。
ShowDatesRelatively_Tip: 將內容清單中的日期顯示格式更改為相對時間，例如：昨天下午 2:10
DisableNewModsByDefault_Tip: When you subscribe or add a mod, the tool will automatically exclude or include it based on this setting when the tool is launched.
DisableNewAssetsByDefault_Tip: 當您訂閱或添加資產時，Load Order Tool 2 將會根據此選項的設置，自動裝載或卸載該資產。
FilterOutPackagesWithOneAsset_Tip: 外掛程式頁面不顯示只含一個資產的外掛程式。在資產頁面，這些資產仍然會顯示。
FilterOutPackagesWithMods_Tip: 外掛程式頁面不顯示模組。在模組頁面，這些模組仍然會顯示。
AdvancedLaunchOptions_Tip: 在設定檔設置中，顯示供開發者使用的進階啟動選項。
ShowFolderSettings_Tip: 在選項頁面顯示 Load Order Tool 2 的資料夾設置。
HelpTranslate_Tip: 在 Crowdin 上幫助 Load Order Tool 2 的當地語系化翻譯。
ThemeUIScale_Tip: 更改 LOT2 顯示的字體、顏色和主題風格，或調整 UI 介面的顯示比例
JoinDiscord_Tip: 在 Discord 伺服器上尋求幫助，並接收 Load Order Tool 2 相關的更新資訊。
OpenGuide_Tip: 以網路查閱指南並開始使用 Skyve。
ResetButton_Tip: 將您的設置重置為預設值。此操作不影響資料夾設置。
ComplexListUI_Tip: Adds more advanced information to the UI and adds extra actions.
LoadSaveGame: 繼續遊玩上次保存的存檔
ResetButton: 重置此頁面的所有選項
ResetFolderButton_Tip: 進行此操作後，您需要先打開一次遊戲，才能繼續使用 Load Order Tool 2。
MapFileInfo: 選擇新建存檔使用的地圖檔
FixAllTip: 嘗試重新下載所有存在問題的外掛程式，在這期間 LOT2 會打開 Steam 片刻（請確保打開加速器 / VPN）。
FilterByThisReportStatus: 按照該報告狀態進行篩選
FilterByThisPackageStatus: 按照該外掛程式狀態進行篩選
FilterByThisTag: 將 '{0}' 添加到篩選標籤
ItemsShouldNotBeSubscribedInfo: 您即將訂閱的外掛程式可能已損壞，或存在其他嚴重問題。
WouldYouLikeToSkipThose: 您確定要跳過這些外掛程式嗎？
LogZipCopy_Tip: 創建一個壓縮檔夾（其中包含幫助您解決問題所需的所有日誌檔），您可以將其直接粘貼到 QQ 群或者 Discord 頻道的對話方塊中發送。
LogZipFile_Tip: 將解決問題/排除故障需要的所有日誌檔打包保存，打包完成後將自動打開壓縮包所在資料夾。
LogZipCopy: 將日誌壓縮包檔複製到剪貼板
LogZipFile: 將日誌檔打包保存進壓縮包
LogFileDrop: 將日誌檔拖到此處；或按一下此處，選擇一個日誌檔，以查看簡化後的報錯資訊。
DefaultLogViewInfo: Your last session's errors will be automatically shown below when opening this page
OpenLogFolder: 打開遊戲的日誌資料夾
CopyLogFile: 將遊戲日誌檔複製到剪貼板
OpenLOTLogFolder: 打開 Skyve 的記錄檔夾
CopyLOTLogFile: 將 Skyve 的記錄檔複製到剪貼簿

ModIncludedAndEnabledTotal: 您總共有 {1} 個模組，已裝載且已啟用 {0} 個
ModIncludedEnabledTotal: 您總共有 {2} 個模組，已裝載 {0} 個，其中啟用了 {1} 個。

AssetIncludedTotal: 您總共有 {1} 個資產，已裝載 {0} 個
NewPlayset_Tip: Create or import a new playset
NewGame_Tip: 啟動 Cities: Skylines 並新建一個存檔。您可以選擇新建存檔使用的地圖。
LoadSaveGame_Tip: 啟動 Cities: Skylines 時，自動開始載入所選存檔。 如果您沒有選擇存檔檔，會自動載入最近一次保存的存檔。

ActionUnreversible.Plural: This action can not be reversed. And will affect {0} packages.

AlwaysOpenFiltersAndActions_Tip: 進入「內容」選項卡時，始終顯示篩選選項。
CheckDocumentsFolder: 請檢查 Skyve 是否可以訪問您的「文件」資料夾，Skyve 的介面和語言設定資訊儲存在該資料夾內。

EnableThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Enable the selected items in all your playsets

DisableThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Disable the selected items in all your playsets

CopyAuthorId.Plural: Copy the selected packages' author IDs

CopyAuthorName.Plural: Copy the selected packages' author names

PlaysetStillLoading: Your playset is still loading, please wait before exiting this page.
ApplyPlaysetNameBeforeExit: Please finish editing the playset's name before exiting this page.
SteamNotOpenTo: Steam 用戶端未運行（請確保打開加速器 / VPN）。
OpenSteamToContinue: 請打開 Steam 用戶端（請確保打開加速器 / VPN），以繼續完成您之前的下載任務。
OpenPlaysetFolder: View this playset's file on your computer

AskToLaunchGameForShortcut: 是否要在點開 LOT 2 的快捷方式時，同時使用您的設定檔啟動遊戲？
TextImportMissingInfo: Load a text file containing Workshop IDs to easily subscribe to or manage them
ResetScrollOnPackageClick: 打開外掛程式詳情頁面時重置捲軸
ResetScrollOnPackageClick_Tip: 打開某個外掛程式的詳情頁面時，自動重置捲軸，以將選中的外掛程式調整到列表的頂部。
FlipItemCopyFilterAction: 把按照標籤進行快速篩選的方式切換為：按住 Ctrl 鍵 + 滑鼠按一下標籤
FlipItemCopyFilterAction_Tip: 切換篩選標籤的方式為：滑鼠按一下為選擇篩選標籤，按住 Ctrl 鍵 + 滑鼠按一下為按照此標籤進行篩選。
ViewPackageCR: 查看此外掛程式的相容性資訊
LaunchArgsInfo: 為遊戲添加額外的啟動參數
DiscoverWorkshop: Look for mods on the workshop...
SearchWorkshopBrowser: Search the workshop in your browser...
ControlToSelectMultiplePackages: 按住 Ctrl 並左鍵點擊，可選擇多個外掛程式。

EditTagsOfPackage.One: Edit all of this package's assets' Tags
EditTagsOfPackage.Plural: Edit all of the selected packages' assets' Tags

TroubleshootInfo: If you have a mod or asset that is causing an issue, or that is missing, and you don't known which one; Try troubleshooting it here:
TroubleshootCaused: A mod or asset I'm using is causing issues
TroubleshootNew: A recent mod update or new subscription is causing issues
TroubleshootMissing: I'm missing a mod or asset, and that is causing issues
TroubleshootSelection: Which option best describes your situation?
TroubleshootModOrAsset: What kind of content would you like to troubleshoot?
WaitingForGameLaunch: Waiting for the game to be launched...
WaitingForGameClose: Waiting for the game to be closed...
UseEnglishPlease: * Please try to use English in your description.
CancelTroubleshootMessage:
Would you like to reset to the configuration you were using before starting the troubleshoot?

Select 'No' to keep the current configuration of packages.
TroubleshootAskIfFixed: Did the last changes fix the issue that you're trying to solve?
TroubleshootAskToStop:
Would you like to stop the troubleshooting here and keep the current configuration of packages?

Select 'No' to continue troubleshooting.
TroubleshootNextStageTip: Skip the current stage. Use it if you've already completed it and want to proceed.
TroubleshootBubbleTip:
This is the troubleshooting menu, it will guide you throughout the process.
You can close Skyve and continue later, it will remember your progress.

TroubleshootCompAsk.One:
You have a package with a serious compatibility warning.
You might want to try dealing with it first before troubleshooting.
TroubleshootCompAsk.Plural:
You have {0} packages with serious compatibility warnings.
You might want to try dealing with them first before troubleshooting.

SkyveDetectedFaultyPackages: Skyve detected that some of your packages are not perfectly downloaded, would you like to try fixing them first?
TroubleshootCauseResult: The following packages might be the cause of your issues

NoCompatibilityIssues.Plural: No compatibility issues with your {0} were detected.

SnapDashToGrid: Show, and snap dashboard sections to, a grid guide
SnapDashToGrid_Tip: While editing dashboard sections, displays a 12-column grid which sections snap to.
UnsavedChangesPlayset: There are un-saved changes to the packages of this playset
DashboardCustomizationInfo:
You can customize your dashboard by dragging each section from its header.
You can also resize a section using the dotted triangle on its bottom-right.
CreateShortcut_Tip: Creates a shortcut to the app on your desktop.
StartsNewGameOnLaunch: Starts a new game on launch
StartsNewGameWithMap: Starts a new game with the '{0}' map on launch
LoadsSaveGameOnLaunch: Continues your latest save-game on launch
StartsNewAssetOnLaunch: Starts the editor with a new asset on launch
LoadsAssetOnLaunch: Starts with the editor's 'Load' screen on launch

PackagesUpdatedSinceSession.Plural: {0} packages got updated since your last session
